cosmicCob.name: Cosmic Cob
cosmicCob.description: A nutritious snack with everything a human needs to survive, the local fauna won’t touch it though. Suspiciously high in protein and fat…

aloeVera.name: Aloe Vera
aloeVera.description: A unique plant that once ground down to a chunky red paste can be used to heal significant wounds, it’s a miracle!

hammerPlant.name: Hammer Plant
hammerPlant.description: A useful plant resembling a hand holding a hammer that repairs the other nearby plants, maybe they were friends!

venusFlyTrap.name: Space Snapper
venusFlyTrap.description: An hangry plant that will gobble any nasty pests nearby. Keep small pets and children out of snapping distance!
